Text: CLE PRESENTATIONCasey a partner in Haynes and Boones litigation section has offered to give a continuing education presentation Guide to Principles of the AttorneyClient and Work Product Privileges to interested Houstonbased Enron lawyers The presentation will be held Thursday October th in the Forum at Allen Center located on the th Floor from am am The seating in the Forum is limited to persons therefore please RSVP to Robin Jordan via email or phone x if you would like to attend this session Due to the number of inhouse attorneys if interest is high the presentation will be given again
